DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether BMS-936559 is safe and has the desired pharmacologic activity in patients who have severe sepsis.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of BMS-936559 in Severe Sepsis
